landing.hero_tagline_rest: Translate content, localize the UI, and summarize insights without sending data to external vendors. Explore the systems that automate localization, governance, and developer workflows across every locale.
landing.hero_cta_suffix: to start discovering content or continue browsing as a guest.
landing.topics_hint: inTXTonic currently supports 24+ languages through AI-assisted translation and community localization.
landing.topic_engine_body: Run multilingual translation and summarization workloads on your own hardware with built-in queueing, caching, and fallbacks for 24+ locales.
landing.topic_ui_body: Manage interface strings, locales, and fallback rules from a single dashboard, with instant previews before rollout.
landing.topic_culture_body: Stories, idioms, and cultural notes localized across every interface string, so communities see the UI and content in their language the moment you ship it.
landing.topic_dev_body: Versioned APIs, webhooks, and CLI tooling integrate localization into CI/CD, automating releases across languages.
landing.topic_tech_body: Self-hosted AI pipelines translate and summarize engineering updates instantly, keeping your data in-house while surfacing insights to multilingual teams.
landing.topic_gov_body: Apply policy-specific tagging, audit trails, and retention rules so global teams stay aligned with regional regulations.
landing.topic_policy_body: Compliance updates and civic briefs stay synchronized across regions with automatic localization, ensuring stakeholders never miss critical regulatory context.
landing.topic_ops_body: Deploy new locales with config-driven workflows, preview UI translations, and run automated QA to guarantee parity across devices.
home.welcome_tagline: Multilingual, tag‑centric blogging platform. Mobile‑first, dark theme.
home.try_ai: Tip: translate or summarize any post instantly using the AI tools.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
admin.panel_hint: Manage moderation queues and tags. Restricted to admin and moderator roles.
admin.stub_reports: UI stub for reported content queue. Placeholder for items needing moderation.
admin.stub_new_content: UI stub for new content queue. Placeholder for recent posts and replies needing review.
admin.tags_placeholder: Placeholder for tag list with ban/unban toggles.
toast.already_voted: You have already voted on this post
toast.share_unsupported: Sharing not supported on this browser
notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Stay up to date with activity on your account.
settings.title: Account settings
settings.subtitle: Update your language preferences, test notifications, or change your password.
settings.language_section_hint: Choose the default language we use for UI, translations, and summaries.
settings.notifications_hint: Enable browser notifications to stay informed while inTXTonic runs in the background.
settings.password_hint: Update your password to keep your account secure. The new password must be at least 8 characters long.
settings.danger_hint: Deleting your account will remove your profile, posts, and personal data. This action cannot be undone.
